page.title: 17Boldron Village Fete
page.content: The village fete is held every July and lasts for the whole day.The event begins with 9 races which are 3 miles, 1/4 mile,2 cross-country,40 metres,egg and spoon,three-legged,sack race and an obstacle course. Other activities include a lucky dip, a golf range,hoopla,guess the weight of a cake/sheep,drop-a-penny and chuck the wellie (local dialect for how far a wellington boot can be thrown).For the adults there is a clay-pigeon shoot. All these events are held in a field next to the village hall and prizes are mainly sums of money taken from community funds. There is a small cup for the child who has won the most races and for the winner of the three mile race there is a larger cup.The day finishes with an evening disco in the village hall.
